title: Add the location 74,28 to the Points of Interest
body:
> by 0x3609cd1df99274f09d60cdf669e5bf8073fbd94f (21Infinito)

## 21Infinite

![21Infinite](https://api.decentraland.org/v1/parcels/74/28/map.png)

Should the scene located at 74,28 be added to the Point of Interest list?

## Description

The scene located at 74,28 hosts interactive art from a plethora of creators. It's aimed at contemporary art and exclusive streamings.

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/en/proposal/?id=de348490-d9d4-11eb-9110-69b867ba991b)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
